In contrast to neutrophils , p38 was constitutively phosphorylated and agonist - dependent phosphorylation and activation was not detected in human monocytes .

Superoxide release stimulated by FMLP was inhibited partially by PD98059 or SB203580 , a specific inhibitor of ERK or p38 pathway , and was almost completely inhibited by the combination of both inhibitors , whereas PMA - induced superoxide release was resistant to these two inhibitors in monocytes .
